column3:
@gmaxwell and I are definitely interested in this, at least.  Will keep this pull request open.

A rebase would be nice, if you have time.

Unfortunately, it seems p2p connections are handled synchronously, so everything this does to rush out the relaying is for naught. The only simple way I can see to refactor this to be asynchronous would be either to use coroutines (which Boost won't have until 2013) or one thread per command/connection. Either one is probably too late for 0.7, as would be an even larger refactor, I presume?\n
